name: Blood Tests & Laboratory Work
description: Comprehensive blood testing including CBC, metabolic panel, lipid profile, and specialized blood work

name: X-Ray Imaging
description: Digital X-ray services for chest, bones, dental, and other diagnostic imaging needs

name: Ultrasound Examination
description: Ultrasound imaging for abdominal, obstetric, cardiac, and vascular diagnostics

name: CT Scan
description: Advanced CT imaging for detailed cross-sectional diagnosis of internal structures

name: MRI Imaging
description: High-resolution MRI scans for soft tissue, brain, spinal, and joint imaging

name: Echocardiogram
description: Ultrasound examination of the heart to assess structure and function

name: Stress Test
description: Cardiac stress testing to evaluate heart response to physical exertion

name: Endoscopy
description: Visual examination of the digestive tract using a thin, flexible tube with camera

name: Colonoscopy
description: Screening and examination of the colon and rectum

name: Biopsy
description: Tissue sampling for pathological examination and diagnosis

name: Vaccinations
description: Routine and travel vaccinations including flu shots, COVID-19, and specialty vaccines

name: Physical Therapy
description: Physical rehabilitation and therapeutic exercise for injury recovery and mobility

name: Occupational Therapy
description: Therapy to help patients regain independence in daily activities

name: Surgical Operations
description: General and specialized surgical procedures in our accredited operating rooms

name: Laser Therapy
description: Advanced laser treatments for skin conditions, vision correction, and surgical applications

name: Radiation Therapy
description: Targeted radiation treatment for cancer and other conditions

name: Mental Health Counseling
description: Individual and group counseling sessions with licensed mental health professionals

name: Nutritional Counseling
description: Personalized nutrition planning with registered dietitians

name: Sleep Study
description: Overnight sleep study to diagnose sleep disorders

name: Allergy Testing
description: Comprehensive allergy testing including skin pricks and blood tests
